Understand, recognize and develope your people

Teambit helps teams create a high performig culture with regular feedback.

or

Tradition People processes lead to

They are hardcore, formal and disconected

They don't encorage regular feedback

They don't make it safe to speak up

It doesn't have like that Teambit is a
modern solution that teammates love.

It's lightweight fun and interconnected

It's accessible regular feedback with contextual request

It creates a safe enviroment for dialog

Here is how it works

Feedback to help
teammates improve

Empower your teammates to know in real time what they are doing well and what they need to improve.

Learn more

Survey to help the team to
be better

Get the real-time insight into your team with research-backed, lightweight and regular survey.

Learn more

Reviews to help
teammates get a fair
evaluation

Get better compansation and promotion decisions with objective and quick performance reviews.

Learn more

Praised to help teammates
feel valued

Make it habit to recognized and praised people who do great work.

Learn more

See your Teambit for Yourself.
Get started in a seconds
